Home » 40P16 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
79 Sanidassanattika, Bhāvanāyapahātabbaduka
Sanidassanattika, Bhāvanāyapahātabbaduka
129.
312Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha…pe…  avigate cha.
313Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
